description: Sends a request message and awaits a reply or times out. The component sets a unique correlation id into JMSCorrelationID of the request and excepts this in the reply message. It also sets property '_correlationid' internally. It calls the 'Reply' output on match, the 'Invalid' output if it has no match and the 'Timeout' output with the original request on timeout.

properties.name: timeout
properties.label: Timeout (Seconds)
properties.description: Provide the timeout of a request in seconds.
